name: Space Ripper (itch) (vDIZv)
description:
Lore games:

You have to play as a famous bandit who is being hunted by the whole galaxy! All equipment in this world works on special energy crystals, the power of crystals allows you to improve even the most complex mechanisms!

Description:

Travel across space, blow up planets, fight off enemies, upgrading your ship. Reach the highest level in the game!

Control:

W,A,S,D - to move.

Drag mouse - to rotate your spaceship.

Number:1,2,3 - to switch weapon.

Esc - pause.
